00001 #########################################################################
00002 #
00003 #  Implements equality
00004 #
00005 package Parser::BOP::equality;
00006 use strict;
00007 our @ISA = qw(Parser::BOP);
00008 
00009 #
00010 #  Check that the operand types are numbers.
00011 #
00012 sub _check {
00013   my $self = shift; my $name = $self->{def}{string} || $self->{bop};
00014   $self->Error("Only one equality is allowed in an equation")
00015     if ($self->{lop}->type eq 'Equality' || $self->{rop}->type eq 'Equality');
00016   $self->Error("Operands of '%s' must be Numbers",$name)
00017     unless $self->checkNumbers() || $self->context->flag("allowBadOperands");
00018   $self->{type} = Value::Type('Equality',1); # Make it not a number, to get errors with other operations.
00019 }
00020 
00021 #
00022 #  Determine if the two sides are equal (use fuzzy reals)
00023 #
00024 sub _eval {
00025   my $self = shift; my %context = (context => $self->context);
00026   my ($a,$b) = @_;
00027   $a = Value::makeValue($a,%context) unless ref($a);
00028   $b = Value::makeValue($b,%context) unless ref($b);
00029   return ($a == $b)? 1 : 0;
00030 }
00031 
00032 #
00033 #  Remove redundent minuses
00034 #
00035 sub _reduce {
00036   my $self = shift;
00037   my $equation = $self->{equation};
00038   my $reduce = $equation->{context}{reduction};
00039   if ($self->{lop}->isNeg && $self->{rop}->isNeg && $reduce->{'-x=-y'}) {
00040     $self = $self->Item("BOP")->new($equation,'=',$self->{lop}{op},$self->{rop}{op});
00041     $self = $self->reduce;
00042   }
00043   if ($self->{lop}->isNeg && $self->{rop}{isConstant} &&
00044       $self->{rop}->isNumber && $reduce->{'-x=n'}) {
00045     $self = $self->Item("BOP")->new($equation,"=",$self->{lop}{op},Parser::UOP::Neg($self->{rop}));
00046     $self = $self->reduce;
00047   }
00048   return $self;
00049 }
00050 
00051 $Parser::reduce->{'-x=-y'} = 1;
00052 $Parser::reduce->{'-x=n'} = 1;
00053 
00054 #
00055 #  Don't add parens to the left and right parts
00056 #
00057 sub string {
00058   my ($self,$precedence,$showparens,$position,$outerRight) = @_;
00059   my $string; my $bop = $self->{def};
00060   $position = '' unless defined($position);
00061   $showparens = '' unless defined($showparens);
00062   my $extraParens = $self->context->flag('showExtraParens');
00063   my $addparens =
00064       defined($precedence) &&
00065       ($precedence > $bop->{precedence} || ($precedence == $bop->{precedence} &&
00066         ($bop->{associativity} eq 'right' || ($showparens eq 'same' && $extraParens))));
00067   $outerRight = !$addparens && ($outerRight || $position eq 'right');
00068 
00069   $string = $self->{lop}->string($bop->{precedence}).
00070             $bop->{string}.
00071             $self->{rop}->string($bop->{precedence});
00072 
00073   $string = $self->addParens($string) if $addparens;
00074   return $string;
00075 }
00076 
00077 sub TeX {
00078   my ($self,$precedence,$showparens,$position,$outerRight) = @_;
00079   my $TeX; my $bop = $self->{def};
00080   $position = '' unless defined($position);
00081   $showparens = '' unless defined($showparens);
00082   my $extraParens = $self->context->flag('showExtraParens');
00083   my $addparens =
00084       defined($precedence) &&
00085       ($precedence > $bop->{precedence} || ($precedence == $bop->{precedence} &&
00086         ($bop->{associativity} eq 'right' || ($showparens eq 'same' && $extraParens))));
00087   $outerRight = !$addparens && ($outerRight || $position eq 'right');
00088 
00089   $TeX = $self->{lop}->TeX($bop->{precedence}).
00090          (defined($bop->{TeX}) ? $bop->{TeX} : $bop->{string}) .
00091          $self->{rop}->TeX($bop->{precedence});
00092 
00093   $TeX = '\left('.$TeX.'\right)' if $addparens;
00094   return $TeX;
00095 }
00096 
00097 sub perl {
00098   my $self= shift;
00099   my $bop = $self->{def};
00100   return
00101      "(" .
00102        $self->{lop}->perl(1).
00103        " ".($bop->{perl} || $bop->{string})." ".
00104        $self->{rop}->perl(2) .
00105      " ? 1 : 0)";
00106 }

00108 
00109 #
00110 #  Add/Remove the equality operator to/from a context
00111 #
00112 sub Allow {
00113   my $self = shift || "Value"; my $context = shift || $self->context;
00114   my $allow = shift; $allow = 1 unless defined($allow);
00115   if ($allow) {
00116     my $prec = $context->{operators}{','}{precedence};
00117     $prec = 1 unless defined($prec);
00118     $context->operators->add(
00119       '=' => {
00120          class => 'Parser::BOP::equality',
00121          precedence => $prec+.25,  #  just above comma
00122          associativity => 'left',  #  computed left to right
00123          type => 'bin',            #  binary operator
00124          string => ' = ',          #  output string for it
00125          perl => '==',             #  perl string
00126       }
00127     );
00128   } else {$context->operators->remove('=')}
00129   return;
00130 }
